Contact the City of Abernathy
=============================

### City of Abernathy

**City of Abernathy**
City Hall in Abernathy, Texas

**Address:**
PO Box 310, 811 Avenue D, Abernathy, Texas 79311

**Phone:**
[(806) 298-2546](tel:8062982546)

Mondays-Thursdays 7:00 am ‚Äì 5:00 pm, Fridays 8:00 am ‚Äì 12:00 noon

* [Find the City of Abernathy on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100064737876807)

This site is designed to provide our residents, businesses, and visitors with a Virtual City Hall, giving you the opportunity to access City Hall, 24/7 from the comfort of your own home.

1 day ago](https://facebook.com/184003165017592)

From the Office of the City Manager:
We have heard your complaints.
The three main thoroughfares in Abernathy belong to TXDOT. It is unknown why they did not prepare or clear the service roads, Avenue D, or First Street.
The City‚Äôs main priorities are as follows:
\* Water to residential homes and businesses
\* Wastewater removal from residential homes and businesses
\* Emergency Services being provided
